title: SMB - telemetry
description: Represent telemetry information of an SMB object

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be telemetry

treepath.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the treepath of the object

DateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date and time of this observation represented by an ISO8601 UTC format.

name.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the old sensor

unit.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. unit of the measurement

schema.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. schema of the measurement

value.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value of the sensor
